## Introduction
The alpseqR package contains the various nanobody panning analysis functions used to generate *alpseq* reports. [It is available on github](https://github.com/kzeglinski/alpseqR) and can be installed in R as follows:

```{r}
#| eval: false
if (!require("devtools")) {
    install.packages("devtools")
}

devtools::install_github("kzeglinski/alpseqR")
```

This page will explain how to use alpseqR to perform your own custom analyses.
